answers.answer: My son is measuring ahead. He was originally due Jan 13th. They changed it to Jan 9th at his second ultrasound. The doctor told me mon that my uterus is measuring measuring a week farther than the new date.

My daughter was measuring slightly ahead at 21 weeks but between then and now (33 weeks) she had a huge growth spurt. I was measuring 3 weeks ahead so i was scheduled for a growth scan which i had on Friday. She's in the 97th percentile and weighs 6lbs1oz at just 33 weeks and I do not have gestational diabetes. Yiiikes! :)
I'm measuring 1 week ahead but my due date has not changed,turns out that I'm having a rather big baby I'm due December 5th  but I'm having  him the end of this month

My second son this time and measuring 3.5 weeks ahead in belly measurement and had my growth scan today he is measuring 6 lbs 9 oz at 34 weeks measuring 37 weeks in size his older brother was 10lbs born so we shall see
I hope everything is okay with your little one. Did you doc say anything about the change is size? When is your next appt? Id call or email just for some peace of mind if it still a few weeks out.

I wouldnt worry to much. I just had this happen to me. I went to a specialist and they did an ultra sound and he checked babys growth, amniotic fluid etx. My baby was completely healthy and all was NORMAL. He told me the measurements can be rather inaccurate at times. I am not a skinny woman and was a lil heavy prior to pregnancy. The specialist said i was measuring ahead not because of baby but because of me lol. Keep your chin up! Good luck!

Ok thanks guys. I go to the doctor tomorrow.  I just thought it was weird that I have been measuring ahead of time and now it has slowed down so I didn't know if any of it had to do with the two vessel cord or not we shall seeplus the ultrasound should give me an idea of what my baby weighs at this time right

question: Ok since I was about 25 weeks my baby has been measuring about 2 weeks larger. At my 30 week appointment I was measuring almost 33 weeks, at my 32 week appointment im only meaduring 32 weeks. I do have a 2VC so going in friday to do u/s to check the size of the baby. Has anyone ever had this happen
title: Size!!
